1.0.name: wordpress/attributor-fairshare-plugin
1.0.description:
FairShare Widget

Turn all your hard work into additional cash by FairSharing your blog posts with others. The FairShare syndication widget makes it easy for your readers to re-post your articles on their blog or website. Advertising revenue generated by your articles on their site is shared between you and them. The plugin inserts the FairShare widget on your blog posts, so everybody will be able to syndicate your articles and earn more ad revenue for you.

Here's how FairSharing works:

  • Download and activate the FairShare plugin
  • Sign up for FairShare at http://fairshare.attributor.com/fairshare/createAccountWidget
  • After validating your email address, get your FairShare Key from the "Get the Widget" page
  • Enter your FairShare Key to validate the FairShare plugin
  • All new posts will display the FairShare widget by default. You m
